plant.question: I am green and grow in the ground. Cows like to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I'm short and cover the ground!
🐄 Animals like to munch on me.
⚽ You can play on me!

plant.question: I have a long stem and pretty petals. You can put me in a vase. What am I?

hints.text: 🌷 I smell sweet.
💐 People give me as gifts.
💧 I need water to live!

plant.question: I grow on trees and can be red, green, or yellow. You can eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍎 Snow White ate me.
🌳 I hang from a tree.
😋 I am often sweet and juicy!

plant.question: I'm big and tall and have many branches. Birds build nests in me. What am I?

hints.text: 🪵 I am made of wood.
🍃 I have leaves.
🐿️ Squirrels love to climb me!

plant.question: I am long, orange, and grow underground. Rabbits love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 Bugs Bunny loves me!
🐰 I am a root vegetable.
👀 I'm good for your eyes.

plant.question: I’m a seed that pops when it gets hot. You eat me at the movies. What am I?

hints.text: 🍿I taste good with butter!
🌾 I come from a corn plant.
🔥 I need heat to become fluffy.

plant.question: I'm a vegetable that looks like a small tree. You can eat me raw or cooked. What am I?

hints.text: 🥦 I am green and good for you!
💪 Eating me can make you strong.
🌳 I look like tiny trees clustered together.

plant.question: I have prickly thorns and beautiful flowers, and people give me to show their love. What am I?

hints.text: 🌹 People give me on Valentine's Day.
🥀 Watch out for my sharp parts!
❤️ I am a symbol of love.

plant.question: I am a fruit that is long and yellow. Monkeys love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐒 A monkey's favorite snack.
💛 My peel is bright yellow.
🤸 You can peel me before you eat me.

plant.question: I am a seed that you grind to make flour. You use the flour to make bread. What am I?

hints.text: 🍞 You can make sandwiches with what I help create.
🌾 I grow in fields and turn golden when ripe.
👩‍🍳 I am a grain that is important for baking.

weather.question: I fall from the sky and help flowers grow. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I am wet.
☔ You need an umbrella when I come down.
🌱 Plants like me.

weather.question: I am big and bright and give you warmth. What am I?

hints.text: 💛 I am the color of gold.
😎 You wear sunglasses when I'm out.
🌻 Flowers turn to face me.

weather.question: I am white and fluffy and float in the sky. What am I?

hints.text: 🐑 I sometimes look like sheep.
✈️ Airplanes fly through me.
💧 I can bring rain.

weather.question: I make the leaves dance and the kites fly high. What am I?

hints.text: 🍃 I can be gentle or strong.
🌬️ You can't see me, but you can feel me.
🪁 I am used to fly kites.

weather.question: I am cold and white and fall in the winter. What am I?

hints.text: ❄️ I am made of tiny crystals.
⛄ You can make a snowman with me.
🌨️ I fall when it's very cold.

weather.question: I rumble and flash and can be scary. What am I?

hints.text: 🌩️ I come with heavy rain.
⚡ I make a bright light in the sky.
⛈️ You should stay inside when I happen.

weather.question: I'm a colorful arc that appears after the rain. What am I?

hints.text: 🌈 I have many colors.
☀️ I appear when the sun peeks through the clouds.
🍀 People say there's gold at my end.

weather.question: I am frozen rain. I can hurt if I fall on your head. What am I?

hints.text: 🧊 I am very cold.
🤕 Sometimes I can be big as a marble.
⛈️ I often come during thunderstorms

weather.question: I am a very big storm with strong winds that spin around. What am I?

hints.text: 🌀 I have a name.
🏠 I can cause a lot of damage.
🌊 I form over warm ocean water.

weather.question: I'm a funnel-shaped cloud that touches the ground and spins very fast. What am I?

hints.text: 🌪️ I am shaped like a cone.
🐄 I can lift things up into the air.
💨 You should find shelter quickly when I appear.
